titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Army to provide a briefing to Congress on the future role and structure of Multi-Domain Task Forces, and for other purposes.
To direct the Secretary of the Army to provide a briefing to Congress on the future role and structure of Multi-Domain Task Forces, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: This bill requires the Department of the Army, not later than December 31, 2024, to brief Congress on its plans regarding the future role and structure of Multi-Domain Task Forces.
